title: Microsoft brings Bing chatbot to phones after curbing quirks
description: Microsoft is ready to take its new Bing chatbot mainstream — less than a week after making major fixes to stop the artificially intelligent search engine from going off the rails.

title: Supreme Court tackles claim that Twitter aided and abetted terrorist attack
description: The Supreme Court considers whether Twitter can be sued for aiding and abetting militant Islamist ideology in the case of a Jordanian citizen killed by a terrorist.
